item.description:
Flip This House star Paul Esajian presents
How to Rehab Like a Pro

Are you looking to jumpstart your real estate investing career and want to learn from one of the nation's most successful investors? Are you interested in learning how systems can make your business run itself without your constant attention?

•How to evaluate a house in disrepair and figure a total repair cost in 15 minutes
•Where to find best deals on construction materials
•How to control your rehab costs, so you never go over budget
•How to interview and pre-screen contractors so you never get burned
•How to limit your liability when working with contractors
•How to rehab homes so they sell before you finish hammering the first nail
•How to organize and manage a project so you don't have to be on the jobsite 24 hours a day
•The 6 critical documents you need to get signed when working with contractors
